attributes.action: Go back to emptying bins more frequently.
attributes.background: The wheely bin service has been reduced to every 3 weeks however this is simply not adequate and extremely unhygienic. We need the original service back.

rejection.details:
Local refuse collection services will be the responsibility of your local authority.  Many local authorities now accept e-petitions: you may wish to check your authority's web site to see how you can make representations.

Parliament can pass legislation to require all local authorities in England to collect refuse weekly. If that is what you want to happen, you could start a petition about that.
